nodes.text: Chola Mavra was a floating city, located in the upper atmosphere of the gas planet Genarius.
Chola Mavra was very in formal in style. It was arranged so that there were neat, rectangular blocks of buildings. It was site of many conference buildings.

During the waning years of the Galactic Republic, Senator Lavina Wren met with the Heroes of Cularin in Chola Mavra and she requested that they investigate a plot to stop her upcoming wedding to Jarid DeBell.
